metadata.name: Higher or Lower
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Guess if the next card is higher or lower. How long can your streak last?

instructions.overview: Guess whether the next card will be higher or lower than the current card. Build the longest streak you can!
gameplay: Click 'HIGHER' if you think the next card is higher
Click 'LOWER' if you think the next card is lower
If correct, your streak increases and you see the next card
If wrong, game ends and you see your final score
Card values: Ace=1, 2-10=face value, Jack=11, Queen=12, King=13
If next card equals current card, you win that round
instructions.winning: Try to get the highest streak possible. Challenge: reach a 20-card streak!

examples.title: Higher Guess
examples.description: Current card is 5, you guess HIGHER, next is 8 - Correct!

examples.title: Lower Guess
examples.description: Current card is Queen, you guess LOWER, next is 3 - Correct!

examples.title: Equal Cards
examples.description: Current and next are same rank - You win!
